attributes.action: MP's should take personal responsibility for terrorism
attributes.additional_details:
Given the mistakes in Iraq, supporting terrorists in Syria and now bombing same and the obvious resultant build up of terrorism/hatred against us, lasting for generations to come..
Should not Mr Cameron and Government show backbone and make a statement taking personal responsibility for the subsequent deaths more bombing will create/ collateral damage of force.
The electorate had nothing to do with the deaths in Iraq or Syria and have no means other than the next election to prevent this continued madness.
Some of us are Christians and do not believe in aggression and killing people by mass bombing.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: Growing Islamist terrorism can only be neutralised by confronting the foremost state sponsor of terrorism

Created by: Alex Mortram

Closing: 30/03/2015
